name: Art Moderne: Machine-Age Modernist Display Shelving
description:
20" Tall x 13.25" Projection x 8.5" Dia. Shelves

CNC milled, grained and clear anodized Aluminum. Machined and manufactured in Portland, OR USA

Shelves screw to stem in multiple configurations. Three (3) shelves per unit/stem. Assembly is required. Each shelf will support approx. 5lbs. Stems can be stacked vertically for floor to ceiling displays. 

This piece was inspired by one of Nick's first design books received as a youngster: Phillip Johnson's 1934 exhibition catalog defining Machine Art. This shelving unit functions as a piece of machine art while displaying your favorite objects. It is exquisitely manufactured with many of the aesthetic qualifications of Machine Art as described in the exhibition catalog. Geometric beauty, visual complexity and the look and feel or beauty of the material.

name: HAW100: Hawthorne Bridge Commemorative
description: HAW100: An Admiration of the Hawthorne Bridge Limited Edition of 100 Signed/numbered letterpress certificate Etched starfire glass and oil rubbed steel 16.5” x 2.5" x 7" Lovers of Portland and its historic bridges: Nick Thomas Design is proud to offer HAW100, a sculptural interpretation of the Hawthorne Bridge that pays homage to its steel parts and rare vertical lift mechanism. Celebrate 100 years of the Hawthorne with this museum quality piece scaled comfortably for a desk, bookshelf or spotlight of your choice. Make an appointment at our studio and see in person. Inscription reads: "December 19, 2010 Practical beauty. Aged Innovation. A testament to unhurried efficiency for exactly 100 years. Portland’s Hawthorne Bridge demands our patience and rewards us with order.” A percentage of proceeds will benefit the PDX Bridge Festival. As a non-profit, bridge related organization, we encourage public support of their efforts. www.pdxbridgefestival.org Industrial Design: Nick Thomas Graphic Design: Meagan Geer Bridge Photography: Christian Columbres

name: Hawthorne Bridge Panoramic
description:
Limited Edition of 50

Archival print on fine art paper

36" x 9.35" 

Panoramic photo of the Hawthorne Bridge by Architectural Photographer Christian Columbres. This image captured in May 2010, consists of eleven photos stitched together.

Larger sizes are available to a maximum of 72" x 18.7". Please contact us for custom sizes and pricing.

Image Copyright 2010 Christian Columbres

Ships in a tube, framing not included.
